item.title: Internal Bank
item.description: What is the Internal Bank? Just like traditional banks, it would function as a bank but will only lend internally to members and hold in escrow funds that where contributed by members both for a reasonable fee. How is the bank funded? Funding comes primarily from passive income and earnings from the products it offers. What are those passive income? Donations from members, earned interest from used bank account for the fund, rebates from ING, CIMB, GCash, Paymaya, coins.
